TopicTitle: What happened to being able to use Shader model 2 in KSP 1.1?

Articles.Content:
Shader model 2 is no longer selectable in the graphics options in KSP 1.1 

This is a problem for me because now whenever I look at Kerbin (ocean etc) my game LAAAAAGGGGGGS a lot. When I was using SM2, the game lag wasn't as bad however as of right now it is UNPLAYABLE due to severe lag.

Is there any other way to use Shader model 2 in KSP 1.1?

Or can Squad look into optimizing the graphics of this game so that looking at planets with oceans doesn't turn the game into a picture book due to poor framerate?

Open settings.cfg in a text editor
UNSUPPORTED_LEGACY_SHADER_TERRAIN = True

 

As the name implies, this is no longer supported, hence the reason for its removal from the ingame settings. Graphics glitches may occur with its use, so beware.
